mention.text: Speculation that the 2:00 PM arrival of Kronos Government official was in fact the arrival of a senior security executive and other officials from GAStech 's Tethys office including President and CEO Sten Sanjorge , Jr.
the 2:00 PM arrival of Kronos Government official
the arrival of a senior security executive and other officials from GAStech 's Tethys office including President and CEO Sten Sanjorge , Jr.
